'''Tavern Carpet - "Duelist's Wisdom"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Tavern Carpet - "Duelist's Wisdom" is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.
